short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool to calculate IPv4 address and display octets and available hosts based on subnet mask.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Calculate IPv4 address details instantly with this sleek and efficient Chrome extension!

If you enjoy using this extension and would like to support its development, consider buying me a coffee! https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/9m2pju

Features:

- Quick IP Analysis: Enter any IP address and get instant results.
- Subnet Mask Selection: Choose from /8 to /32 subnet masks for precise calculations.
- Comprehensive Results: View octets, netmask, broadcast address, and available host count.
- User-Friendly Interface: Clean, intuitive design that fits perfectly in a popup window.
- No Scrolling Required: Compact layout displays all information at a glance.

Perfect for:

- Network administrators
- IT professionals
- Cybersecurity experts
- Students learning about networking
- Anyone working with IP addresses regularly

Simplify your IP calculations and save time with the 9M2PJU IPv4 Calculator. Whether you're configuring networks, troubleshooting connectivity issues, or studying for certifications, this tool provides the information you need in seconds.

Developed by a passionate ham radio operator (9M2PJU), this extension brings the precision of radio communication to the world of IP networking.

For more info, visit https://hamradio.my
